overview: Dirty Blondes - Jillian Janson and Kinsley Eden - Kinsley is in bed when Jillian and Chad join her. Chad's hands freely roam Jillian's body, leaving no question what they're after. With a deep kiss Jillian lets her girlfriend know that rest is over and now it's time for other pursuits. Passionate Trio - Allie Eve Knox and Chloe Amour - Chloe and Allie are ready for seduction as they strut hand in hand wearing only bras and panties. Tyler doesn't stand a chance with such determined hotties undressing him, and why would he fight it anyway?!
title: Double Distraction
